onboarding_desc_1: Change your life by slowly adding new healthy habits to your daily routine.
onboarding_desc_2: Keep the streak going! Consistency is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
onboarding_desc_3: Watch your growth with detailed analytics and celebrate every milestone you reach.
confirm_password_must_match_the_password: Confirm password must match the password
enter_the_code_we_sent_to_the_following_: Enter the code we sent to the following email address
password_must_be_at_least_8_characters_l: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password_must_contain_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password_must_contain_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password_must_contain_number: Password must contain at least one number
password_must_contain_special_character: Password must contain at least one special character
